001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.viewmodel;
002
003import android.util.Log;
004import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
005import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
006import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
007import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
008import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
009import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
010import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Ranking;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service.RankingsRepository;
013import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
014import java.util.List;
015import javax.inject.Inject;
016
017@HiltViewModel
018public class RankingsViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
019
020  private static final String TAG = RankingsViewModel.class.getSimpleName();
021  private final RankingsRepository repository;
022  private final MutableLiveData<List<Ranking>> rankings;
023  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
024  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
025
026  @Inject
027  public RankingsViewModel(RankingsRepository repository) {
028    this.repository = repository;
029    rankings = new MutableLiveData<>();
030    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
031    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
032    // FIXME: 3/18/2024 Remove line below
033    fetch(3, 7);
034  }
035
036  public LiveData<List<Ranking>> getRankings() {
037    return rankings;
038  }
039
040  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
041    return throwable;
042  }
043
044  public void fetch(int codeLength, int gamesThreshold){
045    throwable.setValue(null);
046    pending.clear();
047    repository
048        .getRankings(codeLength, gamesThreshold)
049        .subscribe(
050            rankings::postValue,
051            this::postThrowable,
052            pending
053        );
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  public void onStop(@NonNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
058    pending.clear();
059  }
060
061  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
062    Log.e(TAG, throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
063    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
064  }
065}
